colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (ZHES YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MCHOD DPON PA BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG RANG DANG BSKUL BA DANG RANG DANG BSKAL MYAMS GZHAN LA PHAN PA DANG 'BYUNG NGAM SNYAM PA'I BSAM PAS BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA RTEN NAS BGYIS PA 'DI LA NONGS PA'I TSOGS MCHIS PA THAMS CAD MKHA' 'GRO MA'I TSOGS 'CHAGS SO BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,CUNG ZAD DGE BA'I BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD MI MTHUN PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
